question: Greta Thunberg, Aminatou Haidar, Guo Juanmei and Davi Kopenawa Yanomami won Right Livelihood Award-2019.The award was established in which year?
explanation:
Four people won the Right Livelihood Award for the year 2019. The awardees are Greta Thunberg, Aminatou Haidar, Guo Juanmei and Davi Kopenawa Yanomami.
Awarded for:The award aims to honour Greta Thunberg for her fight against climate change. Davi Kopenawa Yanomami for her commitment and efforts to protect the indigenous rights and land. Guo Juanmei was awarded for her work for women\'s rights in China for 25 years. The award recognized Aminatou Haidar\'s efforts for the independence of Western Sahara.
